description: Nice app. Make sure you read the "special installations" instructions though.

No way to zoom page view in- meaning unless you can see a microscopic blank white space (the document in question) in the middle of extraneous empty space (AKA anyone w/o perfect vision), it's useless. No way to change the view/program settings for the rest of us. 
BTW, very important to follow terminal instructions after install, lol... 
Nice idea but utterly useless for me as font below 20 pts may as well not be there. :-/
not bad still need alot of improvement, im willing to pay if it had the same capability like office 365
